Body:
pt_tr = ccl.nl_pt.PTIntrinsicAlignmentTracer((ZZ, BZ), c2=c2, cdelta=(ZZ, BZ))
for b in [pt_tr.c1, pt_tr.cdelta]:
    assert b(0.2) == BZ_C
if c2 is not None:
    assert pt_tr.c2(0.2) == BZ_C
    zz = np.array([0.2])
    assert pt_tr.c2(zz).squeeze() == BZ_C
pytest.mark.parametrize('c2', [(ZZ, BZ), BZ_C, None])
